text: "Heaven Help Us All" is a 1970 song by Stevie Wonder and taken from his 12th studio album Signed, Sealed & Delivered. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 14 in Canada and number 29 in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1970 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Stevie Wonder songs Category:Ray Charles songs Category:Ike & Tina Turner songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: Heaven Help Us All
